item.title: Video Animator/Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and creative Video Animator to transform 20-second to 1-minute videos into captivating animated content. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in animation, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to bring stories to life through motion graphics.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives.
Create high-quality animations that align with the company's brand and vision.
Transform short video clips into engaging animated content.
Use various animation techniques to enhance visual storytelling.
Ensure all animations are delivered on time and meet the required specifications.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and tools to continuously improve animation quality.

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Video Animator or in a similar role.
Proficient in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Toon Boom, Blender, or similar tools.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous animation work.
Excellent understanding of animation principles, storytelling, and visual composition.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Strong communication skills and attention to detail.
Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.

Preferred Skills:
Experience with 2D and 3D animation.
Knowledge of sound design and video editing.
Familiarity with graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.
Understanding of video production processes and workflows.

Please note, I am not looking for complete perfection. The person is there for structure but the animated character can look differently. I have attached a test video as an example of what needs to be animated. Please use this video if you would like to showcase your work.

Budget: $450
Posted On: June 22, 2024 12:20 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Character Design, Concept Artistry, 2D Art, Digital Art
Skills: Character Design, Concept Artistry, 2D Art, Digital Art
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
